institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 33 (useful life of training facilities and equipment, etc.)
contents: Article 33 (Useful life of training facilities and equipment, etc.) ① The joint training center must use the training facilities and equipment installed and purchased with support for industry-led training projects for more than 6 years from the year of last receiving support. . However, this may not apply in any of the following cases: 1. If it is confirmed that the training facility has reached its useful life in accordance with Annex 2 of the Enforcement Rules of the Corporate Tax Act and cannot be utilized for education and training, etc.; 2. If it is confirmed that it cannot be used for education or training as training equipment whose useful life has reached its useful life according to the Public Procurement Service's notice 「Useful Life」 pursuant to Article 16-2 of the 「Goods Management Act」; 3. Repair costs due to breakdown, damage, etc. 4. If the current appraised value of the relevant training facility or equipment is exceeded; 4. If it is difficult to conduct normal training due to the high utilization of the supported equipment; 5. Training with the supported equipment as changes to the training course are inevitable according to the results of demand surveys by industry 6. When the use of existing support equipment is impossible due to replacement of training facilities under paragraph 4 (applicable only to training equipment), ② The joint training center is responsible for any of the reasons listed in the proviso to paragraph 1. In the event of an occurrence, the relevant training facilities and equipment may be discontinued upon prior review by an expert in the relevant field and approval by the chairman of the board. ③ If there is a request pursuant to paragraph 2, the chairman of the board of directors shall make an accounting settlement after the end of the fiscal year. This may be approved after hearing the opinion of the person responsible for accounting settlement selected in accordance with Article 38 of the City. However, if equipment failure is caused by intention or gross negligence of the joint training center or the trainee, the joint training center must equip the relevant facilities and equipment at its own expense to ensure that there are no disruptions in the operation of the approved training course., ④ Article 1 Notwithstanding the provisions of this Article, in the event of unavoidable circumstances, the Joint Training Center may use the training facilities provided for other purposes with the approval of the Chairman of the Board on the condition of providing alternative facilities.
